unnormalised: Goa-k vochpak yevkar asa ani ravonk khoim book korchem mhunn gunevllat? Chinta korunk zai na! Hem lhan margdorxon tumkam hotelachim addresso somzunk modot kortolem. Hanvem anubhav gheunk asa, chukichem zago book kelam kiteak sopurn addresso dillem na. Tumchea sangata tem ghoddchem nhui mhunn sambhall!
normalised: Goa-k tumchi fuddli bhonvddi yojana korchea vellar khõy ravchea khatir booking korunk zai mhunn vichar poddla? Chinta korunk naka! Hi lhan guid tumkam tea gõdlail'lea hotel-chea patteanchem gupit ugddap korpak modot korteli. Hanv thõim gel'lom, tem kel'lem, aspxtt patteachea suchikaran dhonntta zageak booking kel'lem. Tumchea khatir tea addchonnechem nivaronn koruya!

unnormalised: Poile survatek, rasteachea ankdeancher lokx diiat. Udharonnak, "House No. 123" sompem dista, punn Bharotant rasteank ankde diunk...buddhi vaprunk podta. Kednam ankde ubartat vo portun portun ietat. Uprant "Near XYZ landmark" jem vixoyik asunk xakta. Hotelak "laginch" mhunttlear 20 minuteanchi auto-rickshaw ride asli astoli. "Calangute," "Baga," ani "Anjuna" sarkilea vatarant lokx diiat. Him favo asat, punn vhodd asat. Mhunnge "Calangute, Goa" puro zaina.
normalised: Poili vost mhonnllear poilim, rosteachea ankddeacher lokx diiat. Udharonnak, "ghor ankddo ekxem vis tin" sadhem dista, punn Bharotant rosteacho ankddo... nirmiti xoktat. Kaim pavtti ankdde uddtat vo punraveakrit zatat. Uprant thõi "X-Y-Z khunna lagim" asa je vostunishtth zatat. Hotela lagim kitem asa tem fakt vis minttanchem auto-rickshaw ride astolem. "Calangute," "Baga," ani "Anjuna" sarkhea zageancher lokx diiat. He lokpriy asat, punn vhodd asat. Dekhun, "Calangute, Goa" purem nhõi.

unnormalised: Uprant: postal codes. Goa-che postal codes, zoxe 403516, khup gorjechem. Soglle Uttar Goenk ekuch pincode asa mhunn chintinaakat! Hem hotelchea website-acher vo Google Maps-acher suchi korun ghia. Booking website-acher chukicheo mahiti diunk xoktat. Tum OYO, MakeMyTrip, vo GoIbibo-dlean book kortat zalear, hotelachea odhikrut website-acher sopurn address portun ektam pollounk zata.
normalised: Uprant: posttal kodds. Goa-che posttal kodds, choddxem char xim ani tin hozar panch xim ani solla sarkhe, khub mhotvache asat. Ut'tor Goeant eksarkhem pincode asa mhunn dhorunk naka! Hotela-chea vebsaittacher vo Google Mapacher tem tahkonn korunk zai. Booking websaitt kaim pavtti chukichem mahiti dakhoitat. Tum O-Y-O, MakeMyTrip vo GoIbibo vorvim booking kortat zalear, ghoddta zalear hotela-chea odhikrit websaittacher purnn patto donve pavtti check korat.

unnormalised: Uprant "Wards" ietat. Goa-ntlea zaitea addressanchea Ward number vo nanv asat, zoxem "Ward 5" vo "Vaddo" (eka sthanik utar). Hem ganvant vo xarant aslolea ekdam nixchint zageak suchoita. Hem visarlear auto-rickshaw gayo fakt "sodhonk" doble duddu ghetto. To uloit "Oh madam, this Goa, address all same same”. Fasonakaat!
normalised: Uprant "Ward" ietat. Goeantlea khub patteam bhitor ward ankddo vo nanv astolem, choddxem "Ward panch" vo "Vaddo" (eka sthanik utpadachem nanv). Gram vo xarant ekdom zageachem xist tharaitat. He vixim dokhol gheunk nhõi mhonnllear auto-rickshaw tumchea koddsun fakt "sodhunchea" khatir doni ghettolo. To mhonnlo "Oh madam, hem Goa, patto sogllo same same". Tem aikunk naka!

unnormalised: Hotelachim nanvam, spoxtt torin gorjechim asat. Punn fakt tanchea voir depend ravonakaat. Zaitea hotelank sarkench nanv asta. Udharonnak, Uttar Goenk tin "Sunrise Hotels" asli astoli! Book korchea adim Google Maps-ant postal code-achea sangata sopurn address vaprat. Ek sompem pod aslem tumchea kuxenk salvar korunk xokta.
normalised: Hotel-chea nanvak khub mhotv asa. Punn tum tencheruch vixvas dhorunk naka. Khub hotel ek-ek nanv vattun ghettat. Udharonnak, ut'tor Goeant tin "Sunrise Hotels" astolem! Booking korchea poilim Google Mapacher posttal koddi sangatak purnn patto vaparat. Tem ek sadhem step asa je tumkam khub tras bachavoitolam.

unnormalised: Nimannem, tum book kelea uprant, diunk ailem toxem sopurn address boroun diiat. Ghor number, rasteachem nanv, ward, ganv/xar, postal code, ani laginch unch zago mellounk dhiiat. Tem tumchea auto-rickshaw driverak vo taxi walleak dakhoiat. Ani address sopurn dista zalear airportantlean (vo tum demvchea adim) hotelak phone korun zago confirm korunk bhienaakat. Khuxalatra!
normalised: Xevttak, tum booking kortat tedna, jem ditat tem puro patto khobren gheun doriat. Gharacho ankddo, rosteachem nanv, ward, gram slash xar, posttal koddi, ani lagche khunnecho ullas korat. Tumcho auto-rickshaw choloipi vo taxi wallah-ak tem dakhoiat. Ani tumni airportacher thavn (vo terenar poilam) hotela-k phone korun zago confirm korunk bhieunk naka, khas korun patto aspxtt dista zalear. Sukhachi bhonvddi!
